0.9.1.name: wordpress/glider-universal-hacker-emblem
0.9.1.description: This plugin presents the official hacker emblem on your blog so you can show your sympathy with the goals and values of hackers and their lifestyle. It's possible to use a widget in the sidebar or you can just put it the shortcode [glider] into your articles and pages.
